TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content: I'm about to start filming Project Alexandria Ep8 1962 which will use Cape Canaveral LC-12. Is this one available for me to get an advanced copy of? As you know, I'm an engineer so I can make it work if it's even close, and just needs some configing or other jiggering.

I might be able to provide you with a copy i have.

- - - Updated - - -

Be home in half an hour to,get it to you.

I'm about to start filming Project Alexandria Ep8 1962 which will use Cape Canaveral LC-12. Is this one available for me to get an advanced copy of? As you know, I'm an engineer so I can make it work if it's even close, and just needs some configing or other jiggering.

Atlas-Able?? or maybe agena?

Yes LC-12 is atlas.. Sampa will provide what you need Felbourn

Edited September 11, 2015 by Tristonwilson12
I already gave him the old download
I sent Felbourn the stuff earlier via mediafire
I am streaming!
Im still working on SLC6 currently stumped on the gantry tower, looking for good reference pics

I sent Felbourn the stuff earlier via mediafire

I received three copies form three people. Thanks.

Two of the copies were identical, so I used one of those two.

Has anyone set these up for RSS yet? I am about to start moving them to the Cape in my install, but if the work has already been done..............
I am not sure if they have yet! I can certainly say, it is out of sorts in my stock install!
I found the launch pads... they're under the terrain in Brazil.
DOH! I do not think they need to be there...
Well I just needed the models. It seems easy enough so far to add them to the RSS Cape. I've added one pad and one tower for now. I think I need to scale them bigger though.
Hey, maybe you could assist them a bit on getting their stuff together!
When we get this up and running it will have rss support
btw, can't wait to see the new Alexandria episode!
Im working on it
Looks good bev!

Im working on it

http://i.imgur.com/7GxMnaX.png

Look s nice

Ranger 3, Atlas LV-3B Agena-B at Cape Canaveral LC-12 for Project Alexandria

Ready to launch.

Ranger 3, Atlas LV-3B Agena-B at Cape Canaveral LC-12 for Project Alexandria

http://i.imgur.com/mvmAURM.png

Ready to launch.

Looking good!!!! I see you like the statics??
Man! I canNOT wait to see the episode...I should probably go back and watch the previous episodes again...

So... the atlas2.mu has two parts that are baked together, but I was thinking of animating the tower being retracted for my Ranger 3 launch. You can see the tower I mean in the red box. Behind the rocket in the blue box is another "tower" structure that I wish was a separate model. If it were separate, I can make the red box tower look animated with movie magic. I can't make it look natural if the tower in the blue box is moving at the same time with the real tower though. Any chance of getting a special atlas2.mu of my own? And an atlas2b.mu with the little blue box tower separated out? I could make the CFGs myself. I would just need models.
Ok I just Pm you
I'm slowly building out Cape Canaveral for RSS for Project Alexandria:
